card5.desc: Series A–D. The European defense market is ready for disruption between very early startups and the large OEMs.

panel1.title: Defense Fund
panel1.p1: We are the investment advisor to Athena Allied Defense Fund, a Luxembourg defense and security fund that brings together US and European investors to support startups and SMEs within NATO countries in Europe.
panel1.p2: The founding partners of this investment advisor bring decades of experience in the public and private sectors in defense, security and foreign policy. Our expertise in defense policy, procurement mechanisms, evolving warfighter requirements, funding and investment in the defense industry, as well as our extensive network of industry leaders, startup ecosystem and defense policy officials in the US and Europe, offer invaluable insight into the future of European defense requirements and spending.

panel2.title: Advisory services
panel2.p1: We advise US and European defense and security companies seeking growth and expansion opportunities in NATO countries.
panel2.li1: We identify growth opportunities through alliances and collaboration between European companies and between the US and Europe.
panel2.li2: We apply our expertise in NATO and European procurement requirements and processes to help companies successfully bid on government tenders.
panel2.li3: We facilitate and execute transatlantic agreements and contracts that bring together US and European companies to meet NATO's growing defense needs.
panel2.li4: We are the right solution for US and European companies that want to take advantage of the great opportunities offered by the new defense spending requirements agreed by European countries within NATO.

card1.title: NATO
card1.desc: We know the budget, planning and operational cycles of NATO and member states, their critical needs and requirements, and where defense spending will be focused.

card2.title: Startups
card2.desc: We leverage our experience and relationships in member states and NATO to focus on companies that address these critical needs. Our experience with startups allows us to assess which businesses have the technology, leadership and vision to grow and become profitable winners.

card3.title: Incumbents
card3.desc: Many players want to meet the most demanding defense and security needs, but only a few can really do it. Our long-standing relationships with OEMs will open up critical commercial and strategic opportunities for our portfolio.

card4.title: Technology
card4.desc: This is more than building better drones: it's about information at scale. Success in contested domains will arise at the edges, in sensing, networks, secure links, cybersecurity, AI and the RF spectrum.
